data.comment: In the minute -1, 7192 spectators have come along to Rostov Arena today.
Today's referee, Evgeniy Kukulyak, has blown to start the match.
In Rostov-on-Don Rostov's Khoren Bayramyan is caught offside.
In the minute 2, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Rostov.
In Rostov-on-Don Rostov drive forward through Roman Tugarev. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Rostov throw-in in Ufa's half.
In the minute 3, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Ufa's area.
Can Rostov capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Rostov to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In the minute 6, Ufa needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Ufa at Rostov Arena.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Rostov are pushing forward but Dmitri Poloz's finish is wide of the goal.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Rostov's Dmitri Poloz misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 16, Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Ufa.
Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
In the minute 20, Ufa have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
In the minute 20, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Ufa.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 27, Roman Eremenko (Rostov) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Rostov in the half of Ufa.
In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Ufa's Timur Zhamaletdinov is whistled for offside at Rostov Arena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Ufa needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
Timur Zhamaletdinov for the away team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 36, Rostov have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 38, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Ufa's area.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Rostov attack but Khoren Bayramyan's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Ufa at Rostov Arena.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 42, Rostov's Roman Eremenko gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ufa defender.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostov-on-Don.
Evgeniy Kukulyak blows against Ufa's Timur Zhamaletdinov for offside.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 45, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
In the minute 45, Denis Hadzikadunic (Rostov) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Khoren Bayramyan (Rostov) gets a yellow card.
Rostov to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Ufa at Rostov Arena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Ufa.
In the minute 50, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
Rostov's Roman Eremenko gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Ufa at Rostov Arena.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Ufa throw-in in Rostov's half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In Rostov-on-Don Ufa attack through Konstantin Pliyev. The finish is off target, however.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Rostov a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ufa's Filip Mrzljak breaks free at Rostov Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Rostov have a goal kick.
Ufa's Oleg Danchenko gets in a shot on goal at Rostov Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Free kick in a good position for Rostov!
Rostov drive upfield and Roman Eremenko gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ufa defender.
In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 58, Rostov's Mathias Normann has been booked in Rostov-on-Don.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostov-on-Don.
Free kick for Rostov in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 60, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak waits before resuming play because Khoren Bayramyan for Rostov is still down.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 62, Valeri Karpin (Rostov) is making a first substitution, with Armin Gigovic replacing Danil Glebov.
Pontus Almqvist (Rostov) has replaced the possibly injured Khoren Bayramyan at Rostov Arena.
Rostov to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In the minute 63, Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Rostov.
Vyacheslav Krotov is booked for the away team.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Ufa at Rostov Arena.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ufa's Vladislav Kamilov is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 66, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dmitri Sysuev is replacing Timur Zhamaletdinov for Ufa at Rostov Arena.
Komnen Andric puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 70, That's a fine assist from Oleg Danchenko.
Throw-in Rostov.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Rostov throw-in in Ufa's half.
In the minute 73, Free kick Rostov.
Ufa drives forward and Vyacheslav Krotov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 78, Vyacheslav Krotov (Ufa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
In the minute 82, Free kick Rostov.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Rashid Rahimov is making the team's second substitution at Rostov Arena with Aleksandr Sukhov replacing Oleg Danchenko.
Maksim Osipenko of Rostov smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Nikolay Poyarkov with Aleksey Kozlov. This is the third substitution made today by Valeri Karpin.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
In the minute 88, Jemal Tabidze for Ufa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Komnen Andric with Azer Aliev.
In the minute 88, Ufa make their fourth substitution with Catalin Carp replacing Filip Mrzljak.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Rostov in the half of Ufa.
Konstantin Pliyev (Ufa) has received a first yellow card.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Throw-in for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Dmitri Sysuev (Ufa) gets a yellow card.
